The position of the glow's center.

member.summary:
The position of the mark's center.

member.summary:
The pixel offset for this scene in the select menu.

member.summary:
The depth of the slugcat image in this scene.

member.summary: The depth of this image in the scene.

member.summary: The shader to use when rendering. Defaults to .

member.summary: "alignments": Initial community reputation.
